title: Creating and Manipulating Go Maps
description: In Go, maps are built-in associative data types that allow you to store key/value pairs. This lab will test your ability to create, manipulate, and delete key/value pairs in a map.

meta.title: Creating and Manipulating Go Maps
meta.description: Explore the power of Go maps, learn how to create, manipulate, and delete key-value pairs in this comprehensive guide.
meta.keywords: Go, maps, data structures, programming, tutorial

verify.name: Verify Go Maps Correct Implementation
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.
